summary:
Hell is a place in many religions where people go after death as punishment. It's often described as a fiery, painful place. Some religions, like Christianity and Islam, believe hell is forever. Others, like Hindu and Buddhist faiths, see it as a temporary stop before rebirth.

Hell is usually seen as a place apart from the living world, sometimes under the Earth. Ancient cultures like the Greeks and Romans also had similar ideas about the underworld.
title: Hell
